name: Non-Euclidean Portal Tech Demo
description:
Based on this guide by Lim Ding Wen: https://medium.com/@limdingwen_66715/multiple-recursive-portals-and-ai-in-unity-...

I'm working to adapt it to VR to create non-euclidean spaces that can fit within a 20ft by 20ft room, but can contain much more space within. I've also altered the lighting such that it will hopefully stay consistent to the player's frame of reference.
